Scroll of Heraldic Knowledge: learn additional spell from herald spell list (always prepared)
can ask a yes/no question and get a truthful answer
can reroll a chosen property on a magic item, known feature, or known power (lower, same, higher)

Scroll of valuable battle: summons a random encounter with upgraded loot, all instances of this gained at same time increase the colour tier by 1 to make 1 scroll
Level 10-crafted food with chosen affinities
Level 10-crafted item of chosen craft with chosen affinities
Scroll of gambling: bet any multiple of 100gp and roll d100: 1-25 is lose it all, 26-50 is earn it back, 51-75 is earn double gold back, 76-99 is earn as loot rolls/50, 100 is 51 and 76 together
Scroll of Edlritch Knowledge: learn additional spell from warlock spell list (always prepared)
manifest Healing Wisp of Gratitude (healing ally) for next encounter
Scroll of civilisation: establish new city here, fully automated via constructs. Can choose 1 service for it to have per instance of this reward, combining into 1
Scroll of lucrative battle: summons a random encounter with normal loot + 200*x gp reward, all instances of this gained increase x by 1, combining into 1
manifest Annihilating Wisp of Gratitude (AoE ally) for next encounter
Scroll of Arcane Knowledge: learn additional spell from wizard spell list (always prepared)
Reroll with advantage
Adv loot roll
Scroll of Natural Knowledge: learn additional spell from druid spell list (always prepared
Scroll of general teleportation: instanty teleport party to any location on map (not precise)
Scroll of expansion: +1 bag carry capacity
Permanent +1 to random dmg type
Scroll of soul: learn random feature from a random class (50% vanilla, 50% from compendium). Each instance of this contributes to 1, with adv on the class roll (not feature roll)
Scroll of chaotic knowledge: learn random 1st-lvl spell that can be cast 1/LR
Scroll of mercenaries: sidekick gains +1 to random AS
Scroll of capacity: gain a 1st-lvl spell slot (if not spellcaster, gain basic spellcasting with mental score of choice)
Scroll of enhancement: uptier an amulet
Scrol of refinement: Modify an aspect of an amulet
